com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal

Class RepeatableInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal.SdkInputStream
        • com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal.RepeatableInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetricAware, Releasable, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    by SdkBufferedInputStream. A repeatable input stream wrapper for any input stream. This input stream relies on buffered data to repeat, and can therefore only be repeated when less data has been read than this buffer can hold.

    Note: Always use a ResettableInputStream instead of this class if you are sourcing data from a file, as the file-based repeatable input stream can be repeated without any limitations.


    @Deprecated
public class RepeatableInputStream
extends SdkInputStream

    • Constructor Detail

      • RepeatableInputStream

        public RepeatableInputStream(InputStream inputStream,
                             int bufferSize)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a repeatable input stream based on another input stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream to wrap. The data read from the wrapped input stream is buffered as it is read, up to the buffer limit specified.
        bufferSize - The number of bytes buffered by this class.

        Throws:
